display_name: [An Actual Ace Up the Sleeve] Piccolo

kit.leader_skill: "Battle of Wits" or "Gifted Warriors" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +130%

super_attack.name: Special Beam Cannon
super_attack.effect: Massively raises ATK for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy

passive_skill.name: A Plan to Hit the Target
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) DEF 200% up; (Forever) High chance of evading enemy's attack; (Forever) Damage reduction rate 70% up; When attacking: ATK 500% up; For every attack received: (Forever) Damage reduction rate 10% down (no more than -50%); (Forever) ATK 50% down (no more than -500%); For every attack evaded: (Forever) DEF 40% up (up to 200%); For 4 turns from the character's entry turn: Character's Super Attack will be sealed; Chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up; Starting from the 5th turn from the character's entry turn: Ki +3 and ATK 500% up; (Once) ATK 500% up and performs a critical hit when attacking with 12 or more Ki; Chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up as the 3rd attacker in a turn

lines.text: High chance of evading enemy's attack
Damage reduction rate 10% down (no more than -50%)
Character's Super Attack will be sealed
lines.context: For 4 turns from the character's entry turn

lines.text: Chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up
lines.context: For 4 turns from the character's entry turn
Starting from the 5th turn from the character's entry turn

lines.text: ATK 500% up and performs a critical hit when attacking with 12 or more Ki
lines.context: Starting from the 5th turn from the character's entry turn

lines.text: Chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up as the 3rd attacker in a turn
lines.context: Starting from the 5th turn from the character's entry turn
